template.name: Software List_By Agent (csv)
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentSoftware:
    model: installedsoftware
    only:
    - software
    - agent__hostname
    - agent__site__client__name
    select_related:
    - agent
    - agent__site__client
  agents:
    model: agent
    only:
    - hostname
    - operating_system
    - plat
  hasUpdate:
    count: true
    filter:
      software__contains:
      - version: '{{target_version}}'
      - name: '{{software_name}}'
    model: installedsoftware
